title: S8 Silver 3 Looking for people to play with
body: Silver 3 last season trying to get back into the game and get better looking to do some 5 man ranked to get better and learn with other players, some casual fun for now maybe more serious later on, Top main let me know if you're keen

replies.body:
Sure, I have recently been getting a lot of bad teammates and I think it's a good idea getting a good teammate for once. Support main at your service <3
(Nami, Zyra, Thresh)
Edit: I am silver 1 last season
